direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle string manipulation involving escape characters.
Both methods involve processing strings with escape characters and have similar control flows.
Both methods handle strings and manage exceptions related to string processing.
Both methods access and manipulate string resources in a similar manner.
Both methods modify the state of the queue by consuming parts of the string.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the queue is required before unescaping strings.
Consuming parts of the string is necessary before unescaping.
